attributes.action: Increase military spending to £150 billion a year and use £20 billion of that on a space program
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country needs to be able to defend itself and it's territories. With possible threats from China, Russia, Iran and others we need to increase military spending and forces to a reasonable level and start a space weapons, exploration and reasearch program to give Britain the edge over other countries
